Package org.nuiz.parallelRecommend

Interface Summary
DataList The fundamental interface for operating on data.
Model The interface defining models in this system.
 

Class Summary
BinaryFileDataList Reads in a binary file, specifically one which has 9 bytes for each rating, broken up into: 4 bytes for the user number 4 bytes for the item number 1 byte for the item rating (multiplied by a factor of 2) This has been specifically coded for the movieLens data, though other data transformed ot this format will also work.
CVRunner Runs cross validation over the dataset
DataFoldList Deprecated.  
DataListImpl A base implementation of a DataList
DataListMultiplexer A DataList backed by multiple DataLists.
Datum The fundamental unit of data.
Examiner  
FileDataList Reads in a text file, specifically one which has 4 fields separated by some string.
FileFolder Deprecated.  
HoldoutRunner Gets the ABS and RMSE over a holdout set for a model.
NormaliseData An object to take datum and map between normalised and non-normalised form over all users.
NormalisedDataList Implements a DataList which puts out normalised ratings, then the denormalise function allows us to reconstruct the original ratings.
NormaliseUser Performs the acutal work for normalising and denormalising user ratings.
Rater An object to get statistics on how well a model performs predictions.
UserExaminer Gets predictions for a given user after training.
UserFileDataList Gets the user data from a given file.
